name: SLIME-O-MATIC
description:
Join different details with coloured liquids and transformation blocks together and launch slime-producing machine!

The aim of each level is to create a slime with exact color using provided machine blocks.

Controls:
ESC- return to main menu

LMB - place a block

RMB - remove a block

Entry for libGDX Jam 19

Creators:

Development - iSperia (https://github.com/iSperia)

Art - Man_Tra (https://www.artstation.com/man_tra)

Music - Vova Grin (https://soundcloud.com/vovagrin_music)
